you_can_upload_a_mp3_wav_or_ogg_file: You can upload a MP3, WAV or OGG file.
import_data_from_v3_instruction: Please enter your redis server below to import data from v3 to your site.
export_data_from_im_to_chat_plus_instruc: Please click on the button below to export data from Instant Messaging to Chat Plus.
cannot_connect_to_redis: Cannot connect to redis server. You can try import data manual below.
export_data_successfully: Export data from Instant Messaging successfully.
import_directly_not_working: This feature require PhpRedis extension to be installed in your server.
table_im_not_found: Table {table} not found so there is no data to import.
unable_to_load_im: Unable to connect with the IM server.
noti_thread: Turn notification of this conversation on/off
you_cannot_reply_this_conversation: You cannot reply this conversation anymore.
validator_im_pf_total_conversations: "Total Latest Conversations in IM List" must be an integer and must be greater or equal 0.
validator_im_pf_time_to_delete_message: "How long user can still delete their own message?" must be an integer and must be greater or equal 0.
the_administrator_can_remove_all_old_mes: The administrator can remove all old messages from {server} server
make_sure_you_want_to_remove_all_old_mes: Make sure you want to remove all old messages because it cannot be undone
to_continue__please_enter_your_admin_log: To continue. Please enter your admin login details
unable_to_execute_shell_commands_using_s: Unable to execute shell commands using shell_exec(); the function is disabled.
firebase_remove_step_one: 1. Login into your Firebase console.
firebase_remove_step_two: 2. Select your project which set up for your site.
firebase_remove_step_five: 5. In tab Data, select and delete all 3 below Collections:
see_our_screen_shot_for_more_detail: See our screenshot for more detail.
algolia_remove_step: 6. (Optional) If you're using Algolia, you should delete current Indices im_chat on your project. Login to Algolia Dashboard, select Indices > im_chat > Clear (See Screenshot).
your_im_hosting_package_was_expired: Your IM hosting package was expired.
no_thank_i_ll_host_it_myself: No thanks, I'll host it myself
click_button_below_to_turn_on_off_hostin: Click button below to turn on/off hosting.
data_is_exporting_please_dont_close_this: Data is exporting please don't close this window. It might take some minutes.
done_messages_will_be_exported_soon: Done. Messages will be exported to Chat Plus soon.
im_exported_data_to_chat_plus: Data from Instance Message were exported to Chat Plus. You can't do this again.
im_pick_a_contact_from_the_list_and_star: Pick a contact from the list and start your conversation
by_clicking_submit_all_messages_will_be_: By clicking Submit. ALL MESSAGES WILL BE DELETED and it CANNOT BE UNDONE.
are_you_sure_all_message_will_be_deleted: Are you sure? All messages will be deleted and it cannot be undone.
